channel.title: [PI] - Administrators can't spawn
channel.description:
Heyyy guys.
Iv'e fixed a problem where Staff lost there items on death, and now a new problem has emerged.
Administrators can't spawn. Iv'e checked Config,PlayerAssistant,Client, and others.
I still can't find it, now if I missed it in one of the files named above, please, tell me what to search so I can fix my problem.
Thanks.
-Danny

Ugh, fine.

item.title: [PI] - Administrators can't spawn
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Dragon, thanks, and sorry, I guess I passed it.

I’m examining it atm.

EDIT:

I found this, and was just confused, I guess I should add if (c.playerRights == 2 under admin commads? Not sure, plus have a headache.
Correct me if I’m not doing it right.

[code=javascript] }
if (Config.SERVER_DEBUG)
Misc.println(c.playerName+" playerCommand: "+playerCommand);

if (c.playerRights >= 0)
    playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) 
    moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) 
    administratorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3) 
    ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Danny”))
brandonCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Danny”))
hiddenCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Danny”))
analCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Danny”))
hidden3Commands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Danny”))
hidden2Commands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 4)
DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);

}[/code]

Read full topic

i see things that look like this

    public void moderatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    public void ownerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)

item is under the ownerCommands

item.title: [PI] - Administrators can't spawn
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

This will work :

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >2) {
try {
/if (c.inWild() || isInPVP()) {
c.sendMessage(“No Item Spawning In Wildy/PVP.”);
} else {/
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 300000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

                    }
            }[/code]

item.title: [PI] - Administrators can't spawn
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Ive found it but, I couldn’t get it to work.

Iv’e tried changing the numbers, like 3 and 2 around, but nohting works.

[code=javascript] }

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?[/code]
